item.title: My first post
item.author: Lucas Kerbs
item.description: This is a first heading This is my post body. And a second heading Now with even more meaningless content! And another top level heading!

item.title: I Think I Liked My Masters Better
item.author: Lucas Kerbs
item.description: I’m only three weeks into my PhD and something is gnawing at me: I think I liked doing my masters better. There’s an undergraduate in the graduate algebra class who seems to be in a bit over his head. While lectures don’t assume any previous knowledge of algebra, they move very quickly if it’s your first time seeing the ideas—what an undergraduate course would cover in the span of 10-12 weeks we are doing in four.
